module.name: scimport
module.description: Forward messages across two SeisComP3 systems.

parameter.name: sink
parameter.description: Address of scmaster to sent imported messages to.

parameter.name: routingtable
parameter.description: This option has to be set if the application runs in import mode. The routing table has to be defined in the form of source_group:sink_group

parameter.name: msggroups
parameter.description: Defines a list of message groups of the source system (connection.server). If not specified the source system is queried for a list of message groups which are then used to check each subscription extracted from the routing table. This parameter allows to override to source query result.

parameter.name: mode
parameter.description: Defines the pick mode to filter for. Allowed values are "automatic" and "manual".

parameter.name: status
parameter.description: Defines the pick status to filter for. Allowed values are "preliminary", "confirmed", "reviewed", "final", "rejected" and "reported".

parameter.name: phase
parameter.description: Defines the pick phase hint to filter for. Allowed values are all possible phase codes.

parameter.name: agencyIDs
parameter.description: Defines the pick agencyIDs to filter for. Allowed values are all possible agency ids;

parameter.name: networkCode
parameter.description: Defines the pick network code of the processed waveforms. Allowed values are all possible network codes.

parameter.name: operator
parameter.description: Defines the amplitude comparison operator. Allowed values are "eq", "lt", "gt" and "*".

parameter.name: amplitude
parameter.description: Defines the amplitude threshold to filter for. The operator configured with "operator" is used to compare this threshold with the incoming value. If "operator" is "*" then values will pass.

parameter.name: agencyIDs
parameter.description: Defines the amplitude agencyIDs to filter for. Allowed values are all possible agency ids.

parameter.name: latitude
parameter.description: Defines the latitude range in format [min]:[max].

parameter.name: longitude
parameter.description: Defines the longitude range in format [min]:[max].

parameter.name: depth
parameter.description: Defines the depth range in format [min]:[max].

parameter.name: agencyIDs
parameter.description: Defines the origin agencyIDs to filter for. Allowed values are all possible agency ids;

parameter.name: mode
parameter.description: Defines the origin evaluation mode to filter for. Allowed values are "automatic" and "manual".

parameter.name: status
parameter.description: Defines the origin status to filter for. Allowed values are "preliminary", "confirmed", "reviewed", "final", "rejected" and "reported".

parameter.name: arrivalcount
parameter.description: Defines the minimum number of arrivals of an origin to pass the filter.

parameter.name: type
parameter.description: Defines the event type to filter for, e.g. "earthquake", "explosion" ...

parameter.name: type
parameter.description: Defines the station magnitude type. Allowed values are all possible magnitude types such as "MLv".

parameter.name: type
parameter.description: Defines the magnitude type. Allowed values are all possible magnitude types such as "MLv".

parameter.name: type
parameter.description: Defines the QC parameter type. Allowed values are all possible types such as "latency", "delay" ...

option.description: Switch to import mode (default is relay). Im import mode the routing table has to be specified whereas in relay the routing table will be calculated automatically.
Disable message filtering and ignore all configured filters.
Route unknown groups to the default group IMPORT_GROUP.
